title: FS: T212-1 Obak Bert Coy SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: T212-1 Obak Bert Coy SOLD
posts.post_content:
Ok, I got this as part of a lot a while back and am not an Obak collector. I know that it is part of the first series which is more scarce than the other 2, I think.

I'm asking $SOLD shipped. If I'm off-base shoot me an offer.

PP friends/family please.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242027&d=1471658615[/IMG]
